title: Hacked
body: I recently got my account hacked and I need some help. I want to get my account back and I have told the person who has my account to give it back but he/she refuses to talk back. My account name was DragonSlayerSmrf. It was a bought account but I have had it for about 6 1/2 months now.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, Riot doesn't recognize account sales, as they're against the [Terms of Use](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse) and can result in an account's permanent suspension.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
